trigger.expression: {Template App BizTalk Performance Counters:perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent(BizTalkHost_32bit)\High process memory"].last()}=1
trigger.name: BizTalkHost_32bit - Process memory exceeds threshold

trigger.expression: {Template App BizTalk Performance Counters:perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent(BizTalkHost_32bit)\High system memory"].last()}=1
trigger.name: BizTalkHost_32bit - System memory exceeds threshold

trigger.expression: {Template App BizTalk Performance Counters:perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent(BizTalkHost_32bit)\High thread count"].last()}=1
trigger.name: BizTalkHost_32bit - Thread Count exceeds threshold

trigger.expression: {Template App BizTalk Performance Counters:perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent(BizTalkHost_32bit)\Message delivery throttling state"].max(5m)}>1
trigger.name: BizTalkHost_32bit Throttling State is 1

graph.name: Database size - Ammount of messages in database
High process memory | 0 = Normal, 1 = Process memory exceedss threshold
High system memory | 0 = Normal, 1 = System memory exceedss threshold
High thread count | 0 = Normal, 1 = Thread Count exceedss threshold
In-process message count - Number of in-memory messages delivered
Message delivery incoming rate - Number of messages per second
Message delivery outgoing rate - Number of messages per second
